segments.text: It's heartbreaking seeing the water spill everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's so unaware, just drying her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle, she might slip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so precarious up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he'll fall and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting eagerly, but this feels wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're stealing cookies behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is peaceful, such a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she would notice and stop this before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All this mess could lead to tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor things, playing in danger like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies might not even be worth the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene just makes me feel down.
segments.speaker: PAR
